mapper.select: SELECT m.*, f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM movie m join files f on m.id = f.fk_id where m.release_date <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and f.division = 'main' order by m.release_date desc

SELECT m.*, f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM movie m join files f on m.id = f.fk_id where m.release_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and f.division = 'main' order by m.release_date desc
SELECT m.*, f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM movie m join files f on m.id = f.fk_id where f.division = "main" order by m.reg_date DESC

SELECT m.*, f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM movie m join files f on m.id = f.fk_id WHERE (m.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR m.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR m.type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) and f.division = 'main'
select * from files where fk_id=#{id} and fk_table='movie' and division = 'stilcut' order by no desc
SELECT m.*, f.no file_no, f.id file_id, f.fk_id, f.fk_table, f.division, f.url FROM movie m join files f on m.id = f.fk_id where m.id = #{id} and f.division='main'
